title: The Sword Maiden
description: The heat of battle...When tragedy strips Eva MacArthur of her heritage and leaves her clan dispossessed, she is desperate to be rid of her power-hungry betrothed and reclaim her island fortress. But to succeed, Eva must turn to the only man who can help her, the only man she ever loved.The heart of passion...Blacksmith Lachlann MacKerron, possessor of Joan of Arc's sword, has sworn never to craft another weaponâ€”or abandon his heart to a woman. But once again he's caught in Eva's spell, aroused by her strength, and inspired by the fire that burns between them.The healing magic of love...Now they're bound by a common enemy, armed with a love as rich as the Highlands, and empowered by a passion as shining as the legendary sword they wield.
author: Susan King
